title: Terraform Associate Certification (TA-003)
description: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) masterclass using HashiCorp Terraform—real cloud projects on AWS/Azure/GCP with modules, workspaces, remote state, and CI/CD. TA-003 exam preparation included.
overview:
• IaC fundamentals: providers, resources, variables, outputs
• State management: local, S3/Blob, Terraform Cloud; state locking
• Modules: structure, versioning, private registry usage
• Workspaces & multi-env (dev/stage/prod) patterns
• Networking projects: VPC/VNet, subnets, routing, NAT, security groups/NSG
• Compute & storage: EC2/VMs, EKS/AKS intro, S3/Blob, IAM/Role assignments
• Policy & security basics (tags, cost controls), secrets (env vars/Key Vault/SSM)
• CI/CD: GitHub Actions pipeline for plan/apply with approvals
• Exam prep: TA-003 blueprint, mock tests & interview Qs
oneLiner: Crack HashiCorp Terraform Associate (TA-003) with real AWS/Azure/GCP projects.
highlights: Hands-on labs every class • 8+ real IaC projects • Git-based workflow • Remote state & locking • Modules & registries • CI/CD integration • Mock tests & interview prep • Post-class doubt support
learningOutcomes:
• Write reusable Terraform modules and manage remote state securely
• Implement multi-environment infra with workspaces & versioning
• Provision VPC/VNet

compute & storage on cloud
• Integrate Terraform with CI/CD (plan/apply with approvals)
• Apply best practices: variables

policies
• Clear TA-003 exam with confidence (mock tests included)
eligibility: Basic Linux commands, Git basics, and fundamentals of any one cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP). Suitable for BCA/B.Tech students & working professionals.

seo.title: Terraform Associate Certification (TA-003)
seo.description: Crack HashiCorp Terraform Associate (TA-003) with real AWS/Azure/GCP projects.
